bibliography.AU: Bernos, J; Hehn, M; Montaigne, F; Tiusan, C; Lacour, D; Alnot, M; Negulescu, B; Lengaigne, G; Snoeck, E; Aliev, FG
bibliography.AF: Bernos, J.; Hehn, M.; Montaigne, F.; Tiusan, C.; Lacour, D.; Alnot, M.; Negulescu, B.; Lengaigne, G.; Snoeck, E.; Aliev, F. G.
bibliography.TI: Impact of electron-electron interactions induced by disorder at interfaces on spin-dependent tunneling in Co-Fe-B/MgO/Co-Fe-B magnetic tunnel junctions
bibliography.ID: METAL-INSULATOR-TRANSITION; ROOM-TEMPERATURE; MAGNETORESISTANCE; RESISTANCE; BARRIERS; SPECTRA
bibliography.AB: In this study, we demonstrate that, beyond the standard magnon excitations, the electron-electron interactions in presence of disorder in CoFeB electrodes play a significant role on the zero-bias anomaly measured in CoFeB/MgO/CoFeB junctions. The low-temperature dependence of the tunneling conductance presents cusp-like dip at low voltage varying as the square root of the bias voltage. The amplitude of this zero-bias anomaly decreases with the annealing temperature, indicating interface crystallization and related increase in the tunnel magnetoresistance.
bibliography.C1: [Bernos, J.; Hehn, M.; Montaigne, F.; Tiusan, C.; Lacour, D.; Alnot, M.; Negulescu, B.; Lengaigne, G.] Nancy Univ, Inst Jean Lamour, CNRS, UMR 7198, F-54506 Vandoeuvre Les Nancy, France; [Snoeck, E.] CEMES, F-31055 Toulouse, France; [Aliev, F.
